Culion Island is second-largest, south of Busuanga.
Coron Island is third. Note that the island is part of Coron Municipality, not vice versa and Coron Town is on Busuanga Island.
Calauit Island is fairly small and is a wildlife sanctuary, mainly for African animals. See the

which is a popular dive resort, partly because a battle during World War II left many sunken ships in the immediate area.
